thread.title: Free digital copy of Grow Your Own magazine
thread.title_full: Free digital copy of Grow Your Own magazine - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Free digital copy of Grow Your Own magazine
text: Do you love the idea of eating your own home-grown tomatoes or juicy ripe raspberries plucked straight from your garden? If so, Grow Your Own is the magazine for you. Packed full of useful growing advice, as well as expert tips and guidance from the likes of Anne Swithinbank, James Wong and Chris Beardshaw, the magazine is the ultimate guide to self sufficiency in the kitchen garden. Every issue includes practical growing guides, DIY gardening projects, plot to plate recipe inspiration and articles catering to both experienced gardeners and beginner growers. How to Claim: To download the next available issue as your free digital copy, click here No credit card details are needed and the download process is quick and simple. Follow @telegraph
